events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's message about returning the jacket.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket that doesn't fit.
Hello, thank you for contacting us about your order. I’m here to help you process your refund for the jacket that didn’t fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the condition of the jacket to proceed with the refund?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is still unused and in perfect condition with the tags attached.
Thanks for the information. We will initiate your refund as soon as we receive the returned jacket. Please send it back within 7 days using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help in resolving this issue promptly.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund successfully and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case as the refund has been completed and you have confirmed your satisfaction. Thank you for shopping with us.
